content: this fun pattern makes a super cute mini frog blob for this pattern you will need -worsted weight yarn size 4 -8mm safety eyes -polyester fiber fill -3 75mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch markers -small amount of embroidery thread for the mouth abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch chain- chain decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together fo- finish off
